item.description:
HI Coffee Talkers,

Do any of you want to car pool to Wallingford if you are coming West of New Haven?

Let me know!

The Meet Up will be at

A. http://www.merchantcircle.com/business/Brunswick.Colony.Lanes.203-269-1415

www.merchantcircle.com/business/Brunswick.Colony.Lanes.203-269-1415

B. http://www.bowlbrunswick.com/home/home-center?op=setScratch;scratchName=centerNum;scratchValue=1150

www.bowlbrunswick.com/home/home-center?op=setScratch;scratchName=centerNum;scratchValue=1150

 We can get something to eat while we are there. 

 Directions if you are Take I 91 Get off on Exit 13. Turn right at the end of the Exit. You will see the bowling alley on your right further up the road.

This is not the same Wallingford Bowling Alley that some of us went to last year that

Was behind Friendles (Is this one closing) and Wallingford Theater.

You do not have to be very good at Bowling, we are just there to have fun.

But we do have some professional bowlers in CT so do not feel bad if they are

doing better than you are.

During this time of year, if there is bad weather this Meet Up will be cancelled.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the Bowling Alley. I will have a purple back pack.
item.name: Coffee Talk Bowls In Wallingford Meet Up
